channel.id: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: Prestige Pawnbrokers boss James Constantinou mixes business with pleasure as he heads to Spain to meet an entrepreneur friend who's looking to get a £100,000 loan on his luxury 18-metre yacht. A young widow finds it difficult to part with her late husband's vintage car to set up a new life in Croatia, jewellery expert Monika is shocked when she's asked to deal with a golden rat, and the shop staff struggle to put a price on some rare and problematic black coral statues.(n)

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: South African couple Gary and Dawn are seeking a permanent home in Spain, with plenty of outdoor space for a barbecue, while art consultant Amy wants a holiday home in Almeria.(n)

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: The property expert visits the Wirral, where Dave and Gemma's five-bedroom semi-detached home looks like a student residence, and in Marsden, West Yorkshire, Malcolm and Muriel need to modernise their house to give them a good chance of securing a sale.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Amit Kleinberger, the CEO and co-owner of frozen yoghurt chain Menchie's, poses as a participant in a reality TV contest to find out whether consistency is being maintained in his stores. The company has experienced rapid growth and Amit tries to establish what changes must be made to become a billion-dollar business.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Andy Wirth - the CEO of a California ski resort - goes undercover to learn more about his company's working practices as he prepares to merge an existing operation with a new acquisition.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Luke Doonan and Jasmine Harman help a couple who have lived in the same home for 40 years decide between new properties either side of the Channel. Sheila is drawn to Bodmin, Cornwall, where she spent her childhood holidays, while Fred is keen to up sticks to Limousin in France.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Things do not run smoothly for three Bournemouth couples, as one pair are late with their cooking, talk of butchering causes upset and a pescatarian is accidentally served meat.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples from Hampshire compete, beginning with an evening of Eastern European cuisine with Stevan and Clare, followed by Josh and Bettie, and James and Victoria.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef travels to La Grange, a suburb of Chicago, to help the owners of Cafe 36, an upmarket bistro threatening to destroy the marriage of its owners due to the scale of their financial losses. The head chef's attitude to quality control is driving customers away, and it is up to Gordon Ramsay to turn the business around.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The fiery chef tries to reverse the fortunes of a diner in Bellmore, New York, where a talented cook's work is being undone by the manager's marketing plans - putting the finances in dire straits.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer catch up with two couples previously searching for their first homes together in London. Sarah and Ian wanted a house in their beloved Balham in the south-west of the city, while Louise and Matt had second thoughts about settling in the north-east, but both pairs were forced to alter their expectations and compromise on location.(n)

programme.title: The Knowledge: The World's Toughest Taxi Test
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the test that all black cab drivers working in the city of London must take, one of the world's toughest exams - The Knowledge of London. Each candidate must memorise the capital's 25,000 streets, traffic restrictions and ever-changing points of interest, which takes an average of four years of determination to successfully pass.(n)

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: It took 30-year-old Louise and her husband Andy six years to conceive. Now they're looking forward to meeting their baby and showing it off to their worried family and health care assistant Olwen. Cameras also follow Sammy, 23, who is about to have her third child. An undiagnosed condition drove a wedge between Sammy and her mum, when her bad behaviour was put down to teenage hormones, until a long-awaited diagnosis of endometriosis when she was 19 enabled them to build bridges.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Something unprecedented happens in the First Dates restaurant tonight. When stunning 25-year-old Sasha is stood up, an unexpected knight in shining armour is waiting in the wings - waiter Sam. Meanwhile, 38-year-old sales manager Scott, who is looking for someone to mend his broken heart after the failure of an eight-year relationship, meets 28-year-old PA Victoria, and 55-year-old receptionist Debbie has her first date with a woman, in the shape of 59-year-old divorced security guard Ann.(n)

programme.title: Katie Piper's Face To Face
programme.desc: Katie Piper invites women with facial conditions to Central London's Harvey Nichols store for a special makeover. But what they don't know is that the glamorous person helping them shares the same facial condition - will they be able to tell?.(n)

programme.title: How'd You Get So Rich
programme.desc: Katherine Ryan continues her pursuit of the world's wealthiest people, meeting a man who got rich from caravan parks, a motivational speaker who made money helping others, and a man who can gold plate anything to order.(n)

programme.title: Three Wives, One Husband
programme.desc: The documentary focuses on the complications of bereavement in the Rockland community. Melinda and Anazella's husband Jim recently died of cancer. His dying wish was for his brother Abel to marry his two widows and bring up his seven children - but Abel has three wives already, and the prospect of further upheaval is daunting for them. Although Jim's death has united Melinda and Anazella in grief, they must now choose whether to stay together as a family and risk living through the heartache of plural marriage again, or go their own way.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: The CEO and chairman of in-store media provider Mood Media, Lorne Abony, goes undercover in one of the fastest growing companies in America. Adopting a disguise in his own business, he finds out how efficiently it is functioning.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Andy Wirth - the CEO of a California ski resort - goes undercover to learn more about his company's working practices as he prepares to merge an existing operation with a new acquisition.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Nashville, Tennessee, the spiritual home of country music, but his visit begins on a sour note at Chappy's Cajun restaurant. Chef John Chapman's careless methods have damaged his reputation, but he blames the local clientele rather than his less-than-appetising food and disturbing kitchen practices. Can Gordon get through to this stubborn owner and save the eatery from disaster?.(n)

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug and Carrie take a disastrous journey to New Orleans, while Arthur tries to create a comic strip for Playboy, only to find his artistic talents leave something to be desired. Comedy, starring Kevin James.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawn
programme.desc: The high-end clients and luxury items continue to roll in, including a celebrity hat designer looking to sell her spectacular diamond-encrusted ruby necklace to raise funds to open a boutique. Paintings by East End gangsters the Kray twins cause a dilemma for the team, and MD James Constantinou tries out a water jet pack. Plus, fake watches lead to a bust-up among staff amid preparations for the grand opening of the flagship store.(n)

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc: After 12 years of helping clients find their dream homes, Sharon and Steve Garner seek a home for their retirement, selling the family home in the Spanish mountains and moving somewhere more appropriate.(n)

programme.title: Phil Spencer: Secret Agent
programme.desc: In Ashurst Wood, West Sussex, the property expert helps to modernise a cluttered 1950s home so retired couple Tim and Gina can take the unusual step of upsizing. In Weybridge, Surrey, he visits a not-so-Swinging Sixties pad inherited by siblings Nigel and Beverley, who need to bring their property up to scratch before potential buyers arrive.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jeff Platt, the President and CEO of entertainment and fitness business Sky Zone, poses as a contestant on a reality TV show who is trying to win an action-adventure holiday. He aims to discover whether his fast-growing company is running as smoothly and efficiently as possible, but his secret identity is jeopardised when he encounters a colleague he has met on a previous occasion.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Kat Cole goes undercover among the workforce of her company Cinnabon Incorporated, which serves sweet treats from more than 900 bakeries in 40 countries worldwide. Kat has come a long way after being raised by a single mother who fed her family of three girls on $10 a week. She seeks advice from her old boss, former Hooters CEO Coby Brooks, who also went undercover, in his own organisation. Kat has some lofty goals for Cinnabon to become a worldwide food brand, and wants to make sure that the new products she has put in place are working before she implements her plans.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Gary Fitzpatrick and Shahine Korimbocus want a holiday home in the tranquil Limousin area of France where they can enjoy an outdoor lifestyle with their 20-month-old twins Charlie and Catherine, and Gary's son Dominic. Brought up with French culture in Mauritius, Shahine wants the children to share her enjoyment of it, and to pick up the language. With a budget of £88,000, Scarlette Douglas sets out to help the family find their perfect house.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Jade and Stuart kick off the competition from Essex with a fun and spontaneous menu, entertaining rivals Mark and Diane, and Chris and Rosella.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couples compete for the cash prize in Yorkshire, serving up a Mexican feast, an Indian-inspired meal and, to round off the week, some no-nonsense `proper grub'.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay travels to the upmarket quarter of Hollywood to help the owner of failing health-food restaurant Sante La Brea. As well as struggling to control his disrespectful staff, the proprietor receives a surprise visit from the police at the height of dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay heads to Nashville, Tennessee, the spiritual home of country music, but his visit begins on a sour note at Chappy's Cajun restaurant. Chef John Chapman's careless methods have damaged his reputation, but he blames the local clientele rather than his less-than-appetising food and disturbing kitchen practices. Can Gordon get through to this stubborn owner and save the eatery from disaster?.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer are in south-west London to help another two couples find their dream home. Long-distance partners Jason and Jaye are looking for a one-bed pad with outside space in Clapham or Brixton to finally bring them together, while Hannah and Frank want a family home before they get married - but have viewed nearly 50 properties without finding the one they want.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Phil Spencer catches up with two young couples who were looking to take their all-important first steps on the property ladder in London. First, Phil meets Cat and Ed, who were searching for a home in the area around Chiswick, before revisiting Ian and Sarah, who were in love with the idea of finding a property in Balham.(n)

programme.title: Three Wives, One Husband
programme.desc: The final documentary about the Mormon community meets Chris and Sasha, who have recently moved to Rockland Ranch. Chris's late father was the founder of the community, and he dreams of one day building his own '`family kingdom' with four wives and 50 children, But as the couple decide to approach a potential second wife, unforeseen challenges lie ahead. The Utah State Senate is attempting to make polygamy illegal, forcing the community to rise up and fight for their way of life. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy panel show's version of the words and numbers quiz, with Lee Mack and Catherine Tate taking on Sean Lock and Miles Jupp. John Cooper Clarke joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.(n)

programme.title: The Super Orgasm
programme.desc: For most women multiple orgasms can seem almost mythical. But some can experience it not once, twice or even 10 times, but 60, 70 or 100 - a super-orgasm. In this documentary, a group of these women volunteer for a series of tests in a scientific investigation to reveal the truth behind the super-orgasm. The aim is to measure and record the phenomenon for the first time, finding out how the brain and the body react before, during and after, and asking if these women are wired differently to other people. And if not, is it something that could be learned by anyone?.(n)

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules

programme.title: 8 Simple Rules
programme.desc: The Hennessys watch Freaky Friday before falling asleep - and wake up to find everyone has swapped bodies with someone else, except Kerry, who enjoys her family's turmoil.(n)

programme.title: Countdown to Murder
programme.sub-title: Stalked to Death: Countdown to Murder.
programme.desc: On July 25, 2010, nurse Jane Clough was stabbed more than 70 times in the car park of Blackpool Victoria Hospital by her former partner Jonathan Vass, who was out on bail after being charged the previous year with nine counts of raping her. This programme uses dramatic reconstruction to pinpoint the trigger that set the murder in motion, using witness testimony, crime reports, forensic evidence and expert commentary to examine the events.(n)

programme.title: When Kids Kill
programme.desc: Leah Green presents this documentary investigating the case of 18-year-old Lewis Daynes, who exploited schoolboy Breck Bednar's career aspirations in order to groom him online before killing him. Leah speaks to Breck's mother, who is determined to improve other children's awareness of online dangers.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Benefits Handout
programme.desc: Cameras continue to observe three families who were given £26,000 in return for coming off benefits. In Hull, Tony and son Michael start buying stock for their secondhand business, including two large slot machines. In Liverpool, Scott and Leanne go through their business plan, and elsewhere in the city, single mum Rachel talks to her friend Mary about how to look for a job when you have never had one.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Documentary series giving an insight into the world of debt collection. Kevin Stokes and Brian O'Shaughnessy try to collect a debt from a technology company, but with the director nowhere to be seen, the office manager does everything she can to prove the business is no longer trading. Stewart McCracken and Elmor Victor face a heartbreaking house repossession in Merseyside, where two landlords are forced to evict a tenant recovering from a brain tumour which has cost him his job and income.(n)

Edited for language.(n)

programme.desc: A woman trapped in an abusive relationship is forced to face up to the traumatic events of her childhood and her incestuous feelings for her brother. Drama based on the second in VC Andrews' series of novels, starring Heather Graham, Rose McIver and Ellen Burstyn.(n)

programme.title: Silent Hill: Revelation
programme.desc: A teenager has spent her whole life running from mysterious supernatural forces she does not understand. When her father is kidnapped by a mysterious cult, she travels to a notorious haunted town to find him, and discovers the disturbing truth about her own identity. Horror sequel based on the video game, starring Adelaide Clemens, Sean Bean, Carrie-Anne Moss and Malcolm McDowell.(n)

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: Philip Seymour Hoffman won a much-deserved Best Actor Oscar for his uncannily astounding performance as "In Cold Blood" author Truman Capote. The exceptional biopic spans the six years Capote spent working on his 1966 masterpiece. Catherine Keener received a Best Supporting Oscar nod as Capote's friend and researcher Harper Lee, who a few years later would publish "To Kill a Mockingbird." Dan Futterman's script was also Oscar-nominated. Clifton Collins Jr., Chris Cooper, Bob Balaban, Amy Ryan(n)

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: Action drama about the owner of a small-town saloon who hires a martial arts expert to restore law and order to the establishment. It soon becomes clear however, that the whole town needs to be cleaned up and the combat ace inevitably finds himself pitted against a powerful crime lord intent on safeguarding his 'business' interests at all costs(n)

programme.title: K-PAX
programme.desc: (2001) a man (Kevin Spacey) found wandering at New York Central Station is taken into psychiatric care because he claims to be Prot from the planet K-PAX, "1000 of your light years away". Psychiatrist Dr. Mark Powell (Jeff Bridges) doesn't believe him and tries to unlock the trauma, but as Prot reveals knowledge that only a handful of astronomers could know and shows an uncanny knack for helping his fellow patients heal, even Powell begins to wonder. Then, clues that Prot lets slip under hypnosis lead Powell to a more earthly explanation, or so he thinks, in Iain Softley's assured, gripping sci-fi fantasy(n)

programme.title: Hoosiers
programme.desc: A man gets a last-chance job coaching a small-town Indiana high-school basketball team and faces the dual challenge of bringing this underdog team to the 1951 state championship and redeeming himself from a mysterious past(n)

programme.title: Quick Change
programme.desc: A disgruntled New Yorker and two accomplices rob a bank to finance their escape from the city(n)

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: In Gary Winick's romantic comedy, Kate Hudson and Anne Hathaway star as best friends competing to nab the same location for their wedding reception. When Liv and Emma were girls they attended such an impressive wedding at New York's landmark Plaza Hotel that they swore that, when the time came, they would each celebrate their nuptials there. Twenty years later, after saying 'yes' to their respective fiancés, they've instructed their wedding planner to book the ceremony of their dreams. But because of a clerical error they're both given the same slot - and neither is willing to concede. Instead, their friendship is jettisoned as they resort to underhand tactics in a bid to sabotage each other and fulfil their marriage fantasies... Also starring Candice Bergen, Chris Pratt and Bryan Greenberg(n)

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: An A-list actor and his posse of best buds navigate the perils and pleasures of Hollywood life(n)

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: After losing faith in Christmas and tearing apart his letter to Santa, a young boy accidentally summons the malevolent holiday demon Krampus and his minions. The fearsome creatures proceed to wreak havoc on him and his dysfunctional family(n)

programme.title: Suicide Kings
programme.desc: A group of youngsters kidnap a respected Mafia figure(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: (1987) Oliver Stone's morality tale stars Charlie Sheen as Bud Fox, an ambitious young stockbroker, who's willing to do whatever it takes to emulate his hero, supremely wealthy financier Gordon Gekko (Michael Douglas). Bud's initial attempts to play the market honestly don't light his touchpaper to success. But, when he passes on some insider information to Gekko, his career starts to pick up pace and, as he becomes increasingly embroiled in illegal trading and financial espionage, he begins to make the money of his dreams. However, he fails to fully comprehend the true cost of his deals until one of them threatens the livelihood of his union boss father (Martin Sheen). Also starring Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp. M,W,R(n)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: Mel Gibson stars in this fact-based Vietnam drama as Lt Col Hal Moore, commander of the First Battalion, Seventh Cavalry, assigned to action in the Drang Valley. Soon, he and his men are cornered in a tiny area by more than 2,000 Viet-Cong and engaged in a fight to the death. Randall Wallace's visceral film also stars Greg Kinnear, Barry Pepper and Marc Blucas(n)

programme.title: Just Cause
programme.desc: Twists abound in this saga of a professor (Sean Connery) enmeshed in the case of a death-row inmate who may be innocent(n)

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: Novelist William Peter Blatty based his best-seller on the last known Catholic-sanctioned exorcism in the United States. Blatty transformed the little boy in the 1949 incident into a little girl named Regan, played by 14-year-old Linda Blair. Suddenly prone to fits and bizarre behavior, Regan proves quite a handful for her actress-mother, Chris MacNeil (played by Ellen Burstyn, although Blatty reportedly based the character on his next-door neighbor Shirley MacLaine). When Regan gets completely out of hand, Chris calls in young priest Father Karras (Jason Miller), who becomes convinced that the girl is possessed by the Devil and that they must call in an exorcist: namely, Father Merrin (Max von Sydow). His foe proves to be no run-of-the-mill demon, and both the priest and the girl suffer numerous horrors during their struggles. The Exorcist received a theatrical rerelease in 2000, in a special edition that added 11 minutes of footage trimmed from the film's original release and digitally enhanced Chris Newman's Oscar-winning sound work(n)

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Val Kilmer stars as John Holmes, legendary porn star of huge talent but who, in the 80s, was out of films and into drugs. He falls in with gangster Eddie Nash (Eric Bogosian) who believes Holmes told a bunch of drugs dealers about his wealth and robbed him. Four are found beaten to death, the survivor incriminates Holmes but at trial, he's acquitted, although ex-wife Lisa Kudrow isn't so sure. James Cox's film, told in different time frames and almost from a Rashomon point of view, is a glimpse of the Los Angeles nightmare, where not everybody is a tooth-whitened Hollywood star(n)

programme.title: Youth
programme.desc: Two longtime friends take stock of their accomplished artistic careers in this meditative drama written and directed by Paolo Sorrentino. Michael Caine stars as Fred Ballinger, a retired composer who, at the behest of his daughter (Rachel Weisz), is on vacation in the Alps with his friend Mick Boyle (Harvey Keitel), a filmmaker currently working on a new project. Fred believes he is enjoying his retirement, but he is soon approached with an offer of a British knighthood if he'll conduct a performance of a famous piece he wrote(n)

programme.title: The Man Without a Face
programme.desc: Mel Gibson's impressive directorial debut is a compelling drama in which he stars as a former teacher with a seriously disfigured face and a mysterious past who agrees to coach troubled 12-year-old Nick Stahl for his entrance examination to a military academy(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: After a disastrous summer, Harry returns to begin his fifth year at Hogwarts, one of the toughest he will ever have. A few group of students and parents believe him or Dumbledore that Voldemort is really back, and a never-ending series of articles states that they are insane. On top of that, Dolores Umbridge, the new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher, proves to be the nastiest person Harry has ever encountered(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas, Rodrigo Santoro, and Martin Sheen star in this ensemble drama detailing the daring real-life rescue of 33 Chilean miners who were trapped in the San Jose Mine for 69 days in 2010. Patricia Riggen directs from a script by Jose Rivera and Mikko Alanne(n)

programme.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
programme.desc: Drama based on the true story of US DJ Adrian Cronauer, who arrives in Saigon to take over the morning show on Armed Forces radio in 1965 and boost morale with his quick-fire wit. But his superiors are not amused by his disregard for authority and his fondness for R&B records, especially poker-faced, polka-playing Lt Hauk. Williams's largely improvised performance earned him an Oscar nomination(n)

programme.title: The Soloist
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx stars as Nathaniel Ayers, a former violin prodigy whose bouts with schizophrenia landed him on the streets after two years of schooling at Juilliard. Steve Lopez is a disenchanted journalist dealing with a recent divorce. Steve is wandering through Los Angeles' Skid Row when he spots Ayers. The more Steve learns about Ayers, the more he longs to help the troubled soul(n)

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: A teenage girl becomes the target of a killer who has stalked and killed one of her classmates. A tabloid news reporter is determined to uncover the truth, insisting that the man who raped and killed Campbell's mother one year earlier is the same man who is terrorizing her now. Campbell's boyfriend becomes the prime suspect. A dark parody of the teen-slash films(n)

programme.title: The Darkness
programme.desc: During a family camping trip at the Grand Canyon, a young boy (David Mazouz) stumbles upon an ancient Native American burial ground. He takes five sacred stones from there back to his suburban home, unaware that they contain a malevolent supernatural force. This tale of terror was directed by Wolf Creek's Greg McLean. Kevin Bacon, Radha Mitchell, and Lucy Fry star in a Blumhouse Productions film(n)

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto and his tight-knit gang of street racers must battle the brother of a defeated nemesis and rescue a software genius from terrorists. The film is dedicated to series regular Paul Walker, who died halfway through production(n)

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: Three flawed individuals search for a violent justice on the rain-soaked, crime-ridden streets of Basin City(n)

programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Deemed Dealer.
programme.desc: The detective investigates the murder of a teenage boy who is mown down by a car as he walks through a rough neighbourhood, believing his death could be related to dealing drugs, before digging deeper into the dead teen's life. Comedy drama, starring Debra Messing.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman is attacked and killed just hours after a serial rapist is freed on parole, prompting McCoy to pull out all the stops to bring him to justice - but before long the detective realises the wanted man could be innocent. Drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A carjacking turns nasty when an off-duty police officer is killed and the driver is kidnapped. Luckily, Briscoe and Curtis capture one of the perpetrators, who offers to reveal the whereabouts of the missing driver to DA Ross - in exchange for immunity on the cop-killing charge. Crime drama, starring Sam Waterston and Benjamin Bratt.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and Danny try to catch the killer of a conman whose body has been found lying in a pile of money - a mystery compounded by the discovery that he had been building an ark in his back garden. Across the city, Stella and Flack examine the body of a man dressed in a cigarette costume who appears to have burned to death, and follow a trail that leads to the headquarters of a tobacco company.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team set up a stake-out at a storage facility to catch a thief suspected of selling hi-tech Navy equipment on the black market, but end up witnessing a murder. To make matters worse, $90million worth of radar gear goes missing while they are distracted. Meanwhile, Ducky asks Abby to run a series of mysterious blood tests, raising suspicions that he is harbouring a secret.(n)

programme.title: Cedar Cove
programme.desc: Drama following the fortunes of Olivia Lockhart, a small-town judge, both inside and away from the courtroom.(n)

programme.title: The Mysteries of Laura
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Sunken Sailor.
programme.desc: The detective hopes she will be able to avoid celebrating her birthday when she is asked to investigate the murder of a sailor. Comedy drama, with Debra Messing.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis trace a robbery suspect to a militia group, but McCoy is strangely affected by the leader's devotion to his cause - and begins to receive death threats once the case comes to court. Award-winning police drama, starring Benjamin Bratt and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives Munch and Falsone head for pastures new, travelling to New York to aid the investigation into the death of a teenage model, while McCoy has a fight on his hands with the attorney representing the victim's parents. Award-winning police drama, guest starring Richard Belzer and Jon Seda, with Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Wolfe disturbs a miniature coffin during inquiries at a murder scene, triggering a series of strange events that convinces him the entire investigation is cursed. The approach of Halloween reinforces his belief that mysterious forces are at work - and it is not long before everyone else begins to share the same view. With Jonathan Togo.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Assistant coroner Palmer is called to the building site on a Navy base where a body has been found. While looking into the incident, he spots an armed man fleeing the scene with the victim's passport and is almost killed as he gives chase. It appears the document was stolen to hinder the investigation, but the discovery of a second corpse reveals a case of stolen identity and a compensation racket.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs discovers a link between the murder of a petty officer and the break-up of his team, leading him and new director Leon Vance to uncover a case of blackmail involving an NCIS agent. The duo single out three suspects, but learn vital information has been stolen, and realise the whole Persian Gulf Fleet could be in danger.(n)

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Kelly is a law unto himself in his pursuit of justice for Katie, and Clarke offers to help make sure Vince is punished for the kidnapping. Meanwhile, Dawson resumes her paramedic duties with Shay, but it's a bittersweet reunion, what with her heart set on becoming a firefighter, and their shift takes a sour turn when they're called to a grisly stabbing at the court house.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives try to track down a serial rapist, but have to contend with neighbourhood watch members who become vigilantes. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A missing teenager leads the team to a man preying on the daughters he fathered through a sperm bank. Starring BD Wong, James Van Der Beek and Eric Close.(n)

programme.title: Criminal Minds: Suspect Behavior
programme.desc: The team tries to establish the identity of a woman who was abducted from a car park outside a night club, and her kidnapper is suspected of taking several other people. The profilers are puzzled that no one reports the woman missing, and their chances of finding the culprit increase as the criminal becomes more ambitious.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Terror suspect Sonya Barak goes on the run from assassins sent by her own side, forcing Horatio and the team to race against time to recapture her and bring her to justice. Meanwhile, the presence of a cameraman recording the work of the lab causes Wolfe to make a mistake and compromise vital evidence. Starring David Caruso and Jonathan Togo.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Natalia is arrested for the murder of her abusive ex-husband Nick Townsend, but the team is sidelined from the investigation by Internal Affairs, leaving it up to Horatio and Calleigh to prove her innocence. In a separate investigation, a wealthy single man is found dead in his mansion - and subsequent developments reveal the two cases are related.(n)

programme.title: Chicago PD
programme.desc: Voight and Antonio are called to a murder scene to examine the body of a woman who has had one of her ears severed, a calling card trait associated with a known serial rapist in New York. News arrives of another attack - but this time the victim has survived. Meanwhile, Halstead agrees to pose as Lindsay's fiance at a high school reunion, but the couple fail to make it to the event and end up spending an intimate night in a bar. Crossover episode with Law & Order: Special Victims Unit, starring Jason Baghe, Jon Seda, Ice-T and Kelli Giddish.(n)

programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Popped Pugilist.
programme.desc: Laura and the team investigate when a female impersonator is found shot dead in his car, and quickly discover that the victim was part of an underground fight club. Billy and Meredith go undercover to find out more about a woman seen wearing the same orange lipstick found in the vehicle belonging to the dead man, but soon turn their attention toward a man who claimed to be the deceased's real manager. Starring Debra Messing.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives probe the shooting of a motorist, and arrest a man who helped the victim change a tyre on his car shortly before he was killed. The suspect protests his innocence, and points the investigators in the direction of another man who admits to the crime and even signs a confession, but further inquiries cast doubt on his guilt. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the death of a book editor who was reputedly having an affair with one of her authors, and find themselves focusing on the lover's long-time companion, whose alibi turns out to be a tissue of lies. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A man in a fancy-dress knight's costume is found stabbed with a lance in Central Park, and evidence suggests the victim had been jousting before his death. Meanwhile, another case takes a strange turn when a supposed corpse stolen from the team's custody is found in a river - alive. Gary Sinise and Melina Kanakaredes star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A suspect in a drug-smuggling case is seemingly mauled to death by his own dog, which is immediately scheduled to be destroyed - but Abby refuses to hand it over to Navy officials and launches her own investigation. Meanwhile, Gibbs continues to worry about Shepard's health, convinced she and Ducky are hiding something. Drama, starring Pauley Perrette, Mark Harmon and Lauren Holly.(n)

programme.title: Cedar Cove
programme.desc: Drama following the fortunes of Olivia Lockhart, a small-town judge, both inside and away from the courtroom.(n)

programme.desc: The detective deals with a personal crisis while searching for the killer of a teacher's assistant - an investigation that leads the team into the world of college basketball.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The parents of a baby given up for adoption could provide a clue to the death of a new mother - but the investigation also turns up long-buried family secrets. The detectives are forced to consider the possibility that racial prejudice played a part in the case.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy tries to trap a crooked lawyer who bribes his clients - but as he tries to track down the man's accomplice, he realises the investigation has placed his own job on the line. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A daredevil driver is decapitated while performing a stunt at a street party, bringing the festivities to a premature end. Realising the incident was murder rather than an accident, the team focuses the investigation on a bystander whose expertise with remote-controlled cars makes him a likely suspect. David Caruso, Emily Procter and Adam Rodriguez star.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A lieutenant apparently commits suicide by jumping from an aircraft carrier and Ziva and McGee are dispatched to inform the widow - but arrive to find that she has been killed. Subsequent inquiries reveal that the injuries on her body were inflicted after death and the murder scene was carefully staged to mislead investigators. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Cote de Pablo.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs receives a call from his old friend Senator Patrick Kiley, who claims he is being framed for the murder of a naval commander, and seeks help to clear his name. However, incriminating evidence quickly piles up against him - and a second death complicates matters further. Meanwhile, Ziva lets her hair down to obtain fingerprints from a big oil lobbyist. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler are called in when a woman is admitted to hospital after being found in a distressed state on a bus, claiming to have been raped. Crime drama, guest starring Jennifer Love Hewitt.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man is abducted and sexually assaulted, a hate crime that bears similarities to another attack two weeks previously, leading the detectives to a Dominican gang named BX9. Crime drama, starring Dann Florek and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee
programme.desc: "That's not a knife. This is a knife" is among cinema's best known quotes, as the eponymous Mick 'Crocodile' Dundee routs a New York mugger in Peter Faiman's Oscar-nominated comedy. Hogan, a national institution Down Under, broke into the big time with this film, playing an Outback crocodile hunter who attracts the attention of American journalist Sue Charlton. After she shares his life and dangers in the bush, she invites him to New York, an environment that's alien to Dundee but one he adapts to with charm and humour as he and Charlton slowly fall in love (as did Hogan and Kozlowski during the filming - they married soon after)(n)

programme.title: Airplane!
programme.desc: Sophomoric, pugnacious and relentlessly hilarious, Airplane! is the Zucker-Abrahams-Zucker spoof of airplane disaster films, particularly Airport (1970). It is also the film that made heretofore serious thespian Leslie Nielsen one of the most popular slapstick film comedians of the '80s and '90s. The goofy plot centers on the struggle to safely land a jumbo jet after its entire crew is stricken with a case of ptomaine poisoning. The only one who can possibly save them is an alcoholic ex-fighter pilot with a fear of flying. Though his girlfriend, a flight attendant, and a doctor try to help him through his fears, the situation is critical due to increasingly hysterical passengers and the impossibly garbled instructions. Aboard the plane are the usual disaster movie characters (most of them television performers ranging from Barbara Billingsly ("June Cleaver") to Lloyd Bridges to Jimmie Walker.The final credits are among the film's highlights. A silly sequel followed in 1982(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee
programme.desc: "That's not a knife. This is a knife" is among cinema's best known quotes, as the eponymous Mick 'Crocodile' Dundee routs a New York mugger in Peter Faiman's Oscar-nominated comedy. Hogan, a national institution Down Under, broke into the big time with this film, playing an Outback crocodile hunter who attracts the attention of American journalist Sue Charlton. After she shares his life and dangers in the bush, she invites him to New York, an environment that's alien to Dundee but one he adapts to with charm and humour as he and Charlton slowly fall in love (as did Hogan and Kozlowski during the filming - they married soon after)(n)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon
programme.desc: Action-thriller with a suicidal cop and his common-sense partner investigating a woman's plunge from a multistorey building(n)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 2
programme.desc: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover return as LA cops Riggs and Murtaugh tracking South African diplomats who are using their immunity to smuggle krugerrands into the country(n)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 3
programme.desc: Mel Gibson and Danny Glover join forces again to expose a vicious crime ring selling guns on the streets. With a fine support performance by Joe Pesci(n)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon 4
programme.desc: Third sequel in the long-running action adventure series, in which the ill-matched cop duo of Riggs and Murtaugh find themselves pitched against the Chinese Triads and their vicious leader. As Murtaugh becomes involved with helping a family of illegal Chinese immigrants, Riggs finds out he is about to become a father(n)

programme.title: Stir of Echoes
programme.desc: In this unsettling thriller, a working-class family man becomes convinced he's being haunted after he agrees to let his sister-in-law hypnotize him at a party. Later, both he and his son start to see the ghost of a missing local girl(n)

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: Three flawed individuals search for a violent justice on the rain-soaked, crime-ridden streets of Basin City(n)

programme.title: Rush Hour 3
programme.desc: Brett Ratner's martial-arts action-comedy sequel starring Chris Tucker and Jackie Chan. When the Chinese Ambassador to the US is shot while divulging the whereabouts of a major Triad leader, the American authorities once again send Chief Inspector Lee and Detective James Carter into the fray. Lee quickly corners the would-be assassin, Kenji, but Lee's shock at coming face-to-face with an old friend gives the baddie just enough time to escape. Kenji's trail leads the mismatched cops to Paris, where car chases and a sequence among the under-dressed dancers of the Folies Bergère await them, plus rather a lot of dodgy French stereotypes and a finale atop the Eiffel Tower. Also starring Youki Kudoh and Noémie Lenoir, together with, in unlikely cameos, Max von Sydow and Roman Polanski(n)

programme.title: The Order
programme.desc: Heath Ledger stars in Brian Helgeland's mysterious thriller as a promising Priest sent on a secret mission to the Vatican to investigate the death of the head of his order(n)

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Dean Corso, a book dealer working in New York, is asked to locate the three remaining copies of demonic manuscript - 'The Nine Gates Of The Kingdoms Of Shadows' by a wealthy collector. Before long everyone who comes into contact with the manuscripts ends up dead and his own life is in danger. The hunt soon turns into an obsession and a search for the truth about the manuscript's powers(n)

programme.title: Species II
programme.desc: Eve, a clone of the original alien hybrid, arrives from outer space to threaten the human population with her seductive powers(n)

programme.title: Stir of Echoes: The Homecoming
programme.desc: This direct-to-DVD sequel features Rob Lowe as an Iraq War veteran whose past comes back to haunt him in Stir of Echoes: The Homecoming. Upon returning home from the line of duty, National Guard Captain Ted Cogan thought his life would go back to normal, until he started seeing visions of a group of innocent bystanders he inadvertently killed in Iraq. With his family on the brink of destruction, Ted turns to a psychic that aids him in understanding what needs to be done to put these restless souls at peace - even if it means giving up his own life(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas, Rodrigo Santoro, and Martin Sheen star in this ensemble drama detailing the daring real-life rescue of 33 Chilean miners who were trapped in the San Jose Mine for 69 days in 2010. Patricia Riggen directs from a script by Jose Rivera and Mikko Alanne(n)

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Darren Aronofsky's excellent drama about a burnt-out wrestler's stuggle for redemption, featuring Oscar-nominated performances from Mickey Rourke and Marisa Tomei(n)

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Retired male stripper Magic Mike decides to help his friends put on one last show, as the crew embark on a road trip to Myrtle Beach to perform at an exotic-dance convention. Along the way, they brighten the lives of several women in this sexy sequel(n)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster in this uproarious comedy(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Big-budget action fantasy starring Kevin Costner about the battle for survival in a world where dry land has disappeared with the melting of the polar ice caps. An amphibious loner, 'The Mariner', tries to protect survivors on an artificial atoll made from scrap metal by taking on a gang of marauding pirates. He is also intent on discovering if there is any truth in the myth that there is still some land left above water(n)

programme.title: The League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
programme.desc: Sean Connery is the adventurer who joins Captain Nemo, the Invisible Man, Dorian Gray and other fictional heroes to save the world. FX-packed comic book action(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his friends to go on a road trip to find her(n)

programme.title: Sudden Impact
programme.desc: Classic gritty crime action starring and directed by the great Clint Eastwood. 'Dirty' Harry Callahan hunts for a vengeful murderer in the seaside town of San Paulo. Dir: Clint Eastwood(n)

programme.title: The Glimmer Man
programme.desc: Two cops with almost nothing in common find themselves brought together to capture a psychotic murderer in this action thriller. They must work together to solve a chain of mysterious killings by a killer nicknamed "The Family Man" for his habit of dispatching entire households at once(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: A cop in a hi-tech "pre-crime" unit in 2054 goes on the run after being labelled as a future killer. In order to prove his innocence, he kidnaps one of the psychics who predicts the imminent crimes while eluding a determined government agent(n)

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Canadian safecracker Nick Wells has lost the taste for crime, but one final offer from his old fence Max lures him back into the game. Only this time he's working with a young hotshot who has his own plans for the theft of a priceless sceptre(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk
programme.desc: Mild-mannered scientist Bruce Banner has been traveling the globe in search of the antidote that will allow him to break free from his primal alter ego, but both the warmongers who long to exploit him for their own gain and a horrific creature known as The Abomination are determined to stop him from achieving his noble goal in Transporter 2 director Louis Leterrier's take on the classic Marvel Comics superhero tale. For years, Bruce (Edward Norton) has been living in the shadows, pursued by the military and haunted by the rage within. But traveling the world in secrecy isn't easy, and as hard as he tries Bruce can't get Betty Ross (Liv Tyler) off his mind. The daughter of Bruce's nemesis Gen. Thaddeus "Thunderbolt" Ross (William Hurt), Betty represents everything that is beautiful in the world to a man who lives his life on the run. Eventually, Bruce returns to civilization and faces the wrath of The Abomination. While the Hulk may be a formidable force of nature, The Abomination is decidedly more powerful, and determined to destroy Bruce Banner. Created when KGB agent Emil Blonsky (Tim Roth) exposed himself to a higher dose of the same radiation that transformed Bruce into The Hulk, The Abomination is unable to change back into human form and holds Bruce accountable for his frightful condition. With time fast running out for both Bruce and The Hulk, New York City is about to become the ultimate urban battle zone as two of the most powerful creatures ever to walk the earth clash in a massive, no-holds-barred fight to the finish(n)

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot races to rescue his estranged daughter after a huge earthquake hits California(n)

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg stars as a cop with vengeance on his mind in John Moore's video game-based CGI noir. The eponymous NYPD detective's life is torn apart by the brutal murder of his wife and child. Determined to track down those responsible and wreak bloody revenge, he leaves no stone unturned. His dedication pays off when investigating a tip-off about some drugs dealers. They put him on the trail of the manufacturers of a dangerous new hallucinogen that causes users to become both violent and fearless. But, just as he seems to be making progress, he finds himself prime suspect for a murder he did not commit..(n)

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A futuristic cyborg is sent to present-day Los Angeles to assassinate a woman, who will bear the child who will someday save humanity(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: Director Peter Weir's first turn behind the camera since 1998's critically acclaimed The Truman Show, Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World is based on two Napoleonic War-era adventure novels in author Patrick O'Brian's Aubrey/Maturin series, Master and Commander and The Far Side of the World. Russell Crowe stars as Captain Jack Aubrey, a high-seas adventurer who maintains a strong bond with ship-surgeon Stephen Maturin (Paul Bettany). After conquering much of Europe already, Napoleon's forces have set their sights on taking Britain, so Aubrey and the crew of his ship, the HMS Surprise, take to the Pacific to intercept any attacking ships from the French fleet. When Aubrey eyes a renegade French super-frigate, the Surprise pursues, leading to an adrenaline-charged chase through the distant reaches of the sea. Edward Woodall, James D'Arcy, and Lee Ingleby also star as members of the Surprise's crew(n)
