programme.title: Wild Oats
programme.desc: When a woman wrongly receives millions of dollars in life insurance, her best friend convinces her to take off and spend it. Comedy, starring Shirley MacLaine, Jessica Lange and Billy Connolly.(n)

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley.(n)

programme.title: Date and Switch
programme.desc: Two guys make a pact to lose their virginity before their senior prom, but things take an unexpected turn when one of them comes out of the closet. Comedy, starring Nicholas Braun, Hunter Cope and Dakota Johnson.(n)

programme.desc: The spread of a rage-inducing virus causes chaos when a group of Americans turn up to work at a remote Spanish summer camp. Horror, starring Diego Boneta, Jocelin Donahue and Maiara Walsh.(n)

programme.title: The Brand New Testament
programme.desc: God secretly lives in Brussels, spending his time enacting spiteful punishments on the human race. His rebellious daughter tries to teach him a lesson by sending everyone on Earth a message containing the date of their death. As the world is plunged into chaos, she flees from her furious father - who gains a new insight into his creation. Comedy, starring Pili Groyne, Benoit Poelvoorde and Catherine Deneuve. In French and German.(n)

programme.title: K-Shop
programme.desc: A Bournemouth takeaway owner despairs of his drunken, abusive customers and is finally pushed to the limit when his father is killed in a violent altercation. He begins murdering the people who make his life a misery, and disposes of the bodies by making them into kebabs. Horror, starring Reece Noi and Ewen MacIntosh.(n)

programme.title: Titan AE
programme.desc: In the year 3038, an alien race has annihilated almost all of mankind and destroyed the Earth. A scientist escapes the planet on board a craft that is destined to be humanity's only chance of future survival - the spaceship Titan. Fourteen years later, his estranged son plucks up courage and sets out on a perilous journey to find the ship and reunite with his father. Animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Matt Damon, Bill Pullman and Drew Barrymore.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A gifted young scientist joins a secret project researching inter-dimensional travel, and return from a journey to another world granted superhuman powers. Their abilities make them the only hope for Earth's survival when a colleague who was lost on their expedition returns to wreak vengeance. Superhero adventure, starring Miles Teller, Michael B Jordan, Kate Mara and Jamie Bell.(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy.(n)

programme.title: Kill Command
programme.desc: An elite military unit is flown to a top secret facility for a training exercise. The soldiers are intended to be put to the test in a battle simulation against robots, but when the machines start trying to really kill them, they discover a deadly threat to the human race. Sci-fi thriller, starring Vanessa Kirby and Thure Lindhardt.(n)

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: John Connor finds his destiny to lead the human race in a future war is catching up with him when an advanced new Terminator in female form is sent back in time to eliminate him. However, a reprogrammed cyborg has also been dispatched to act as his protector. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Claire Danes and Kristanna Loken.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A gifted young scientist joins a secret project researching inter-dimensional travel, and return from a journey to another world granted superhuman powers. Their abilities make them the only hope for Earth's survival when a colleague who was lost on their expedition returns to wreak vengeance. Superhero adventure, starring Miles Teller, Michael B Jordan, Kate Mara and Jamie Bell.(n)

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy.(n)

programme.title: Kill Command
programme.desc: An elite military unit is flown to a top secret facility for a training exercise. The soldiers are intended to be put to the test in a battle simulation against robots, but when the machines start trying to really kill them, they discover a deadly threat to the human race. Sci-fi thriller, starring Vanessa Kirby and Thure Lindhardt.(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: Cop John Anderton is forced to go on the run when a supposedly infallible trio of psychics foretell he is about to kill a man he has never heard of. Convinced their prediction is false, he kidnaps one of the so-called precogs to prove his innocence - and stumbles across a complex conspiracy. Steven Spielberg's futuristic thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton and Max von Sydow.(n)

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: John Connor finds his destiny to lead the human race in a future war is catching up with him when an advanced new Terminator in female form is sent back in time to eliminate him. However, a reprogrammed cyborg has also been dispatched to act as his protector. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Claire Danes and Kristanna Loken.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell: Special
programme.desc: A look at the live-action remake of the iconic sci-fi animation, starring Scarlett Johansson, Takeshi Kitano and Michael Pitt.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrowland: A World Beyond
programme.desc: A boy genius in the 1960s finds his way into a spectacular futuristic metropolis while attempting to promote his idea for a jetpack. Decades later, he has grown into a disillusioned adult, while a girl who has the talent and enthusiasm he has lost also finds her way into this strange new world, and together they attempt to uncover its secrets. Fantasy adventure, starring George Clooney, Britt Robertson and Hugh Laurie.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell: Special
programme.desc: A look at the live-action remake of the iconic sci-fi animation, starring Scarlett Johansson, Takeshi Kitano and Michael Pitt.(n)

programme.title: Eragon
programme.desc: A young farm boy discovers a dragon's egg, which hatches into the last surviving specimen of its mighty race. His friendship with the winged creature soon comes in handy when he discovers he is destined to overthrow the evil tyrant who has taken control of the kingdom. Fantasy adventure, starring Ed Speleers, Jeremy Irons, Robert Carlyle and Sienna Guillory, with Rachel Weisz providing the voice of the dragon.(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan.(n)

programme.title: Don't Blink
programme.desc: A group of 10 friends drives to a remote mountain resort. When they arrive, they discover it is completely deserted with no signs of life. With no petrol, they are unable to make the return trip so stay the night - only to face a sinister mystery when they begin disappearing one by one. Horror, starring Mena Suvari and Brian Austin Green.(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.(n)

programme.title: The Martian

However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last a month. programme.title: Hacked
programme.desc: A student watches a video of a murder on the internet, but the police refuse to believe the events in the film are real. She sets out to prove someone really has been killed, only to find herself trapped in a deadly game and in danger of becoming the murderer's next target. Thriller, starring Melanie Papalia and David Schlachtenhaufen.(n)

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: In this stirring biopic, jazzman Chet Baker relearns his craft in the late '60s after his front teeth are knocked out during a mugging. As he strives to get his career back on track and overcome a drug addiction, he receives support from his girlfriend, an actress who was cast to play his lover in a movie about his life(n)

programme.title: Requiem for a Dream
programme.desc: Darren Aronofsky follows up on his critically acclaimed Pi with this grim fable about drugs and addiction. Sara Goldfarb (Ellen Burstyn) is a bored and lonely widow who kills time watching infomercials and eating chocolate in her small Coney Island apartment. One day she receives a phone call telling her that she might have the opportunity to appear on her favorite TV game show. Beside herself with anticipation, she frets over her chocolate-induced weight and vows to return to her former svelte figure. With the help of a less than reputable doctor, Sara is soon on a steady regimen of uppers. Meanwhile, her deadbeat son Harry (Jared Leto) aims for his shot at quick success along with his buddy Tyrone (Marlon Wayans) by selling heroin on the street. Harry and his girlfriend Marion (Jennifer Connelly) squirrel away dough so that they can open a boutique that will showcase her fashion designs. When drug deals go bad and the money starts to dry up, the three siphon off their wares for their own habits. At the same time, Sara descends further and further into a popper-induced psychosis. By the film's grisly climax, limbs are lopped off, flesh is pedaled, and electroshock therapy is administered. This film was screened at the 2000 Cannes and Toronto film festivals(n)

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: Adventure tale about a rather clueless DIY detective with his own built-in tool kit whose grafted-on gizmos and gadgets make him a one-man army and more than a match for the evil Dr Claw(n)

programme.title: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
programme.desc: A laid-back health inspector's comfortable routine receives an unwelcome shake up when he's assigned the task of training his new rookie partner and investigating the outbreak of a mysterious illness at one of the city's most posh restraints in this no-holds-barred comedy starring Blue Collar standup king Larry the Cable Guy. It's all greasy spoons and low-rent ethnic eateries in the world of seasoned big-city health inspector Larry (Larry the Cable Guy), and that's just the way he likes it. After begrudgingly accepting the task of training by-the-books trainee Amy (Iris Bahr), Larry lands the biggest case of his career when a group of high-class diners fall ill following a particularly pricey meal. Though the gruff but lovable health inspector soon loses his job as a direct result of his questionable manners, he soon wins the heart of a shy waitress while attempting to go undercover to crack the case and ensure that the conspirators who engineered the poisonous plan are brought to justice(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: Romantic drama in which a top female surfer training for a high-profile competition in Hawaii finds her preparation jeopardised when she falls for a hunky American football player staying in town(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush 2
programme.desc: California teen Dana is a champion surfer who never met a wave she couldn't conquer. When her father pressures her to buckle down and go to college, she flees her Beverly Hills home for the adventure of a lifetime. Dana's late mother grew up in South Africa, and kept a detailed diary about her childhood experiences. With the journal in hand and a mismatched gang of surf fanatics watching her back, Dana embarks on an odyssey along the breathtaking southern coast of Africa to fulfill her mother's dream-one long, flawless journey down the barrel of the killer waves of Jeffreys Bay(n)

programme.title: The Ladies Man
programme.desc: Saturday Night Live cast member Tim Meadows gets his own movie as Leon Phelps, a radio host and sex therapy expert. (2000)(n)

programme.title: The Ghost Writer

programme.title: Crash
programme.desc: Issues of race and gender cause a group of strangers in Los Angeles to physically and emotionally collide in this drama from director and screenwriter Paul Haggis. Graham (Don Cheadle) is a police detective whose brother is a street criminal, and it hurts him to know his mother cares more about his ne'er-do-well brother than him. Graham's partner is Ria (Jennifer Esposito), who is also his girlfriend, though she has begun to bristle at his emotional distance, as well as his occasional insensitivity over the fact he's African-American and she's Hispanic. Rick (Brendan Fraser) is an L.A. district attorney whose wife, Jean (Sandra Bullock), makes little secret of her fear and hatred of people unlike herself. Jean's worst imaginings about people of color are confirmed when her SUV is carjacked by two African-American men -- Anthony (Chris Bridges, aka Ludacris), who dislikes white people as much as Jean hates blacks, and Peter (Larenz Tate), who is more open minded. Cameron (Terrence Howard) is a well-to-do African-American television producer with a beautiful wife, Christine (Thandie Newton). While coming home from a party, Cameron and Christine are pulled over by Officer Ryan (Matt Dillon), who subjects them to a humiliating interrogation (and her to an inappropriate search) while his new partner, Officer Hansen (Ryan Phillippe), looks on. Daniel (Michael Pena) is a hard-working locksmith and dedicated father who discovers that his looks don't lead many of his customers to trust him. And Farhad (Shaun Toub) is a Middle Eastern shopkeeper who is so constantly threatened in the wake of the 9/11 attacks that he decided he needs a gun to defend his family. Crash was the first directorial project for award-winning television and film writer Haggis(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: The life of mathematician Srinivasa Ramanujan is detailed in this biopic. Despite opposition in the forms of early-life poverty and constant racism, he became one of the most important and revolutionary pioneers in his field(n)

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation
programme.desc: Dmitry Bivol (9-0, 7 KOs) faces Samuel Clarkson (19-3, 12 KOs) in a light-heavyweight bout in Oxon Hill, Md(n)

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: The Kingmaker. Axe faces opposition investigating Sandicot; Chuck digs up dirt on a rival(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: A pack of corrupt cops plan the murder of an innocent fellow officer as a way to distract law enforcement from their simultaneous heist across town, but their target survives the attack and attempts to foil their plot(n)

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: In this stirring biopic, jazzman Chet Baker relearns his craft in the late '60s after his front teeth are knocked out during a mugging. As he strives to get his career back on track and overcome a drug addiction, he receives support from his girlfriend, an actress who was cast to play his lover in a movie about his life(n)

programme.title: Requiem for a Dream
programme.desc: Darren Aronofsky follows up on his critically acclaimed Pi with this grim fable about drugs and addiction. Sara Goldfarb (Ellen Burstyn) is a bored and lonely widow who kills time watching infomercials and eating chocolate in her small Coney Island apartment. One day she receives a phone call telling her that she might have the opportunity to appear on her favorite TV game show. Beside herself with anticipation, she frets over her chocolate-induced weight and vows to return to her former svelte figure. With the help of a less than reputable doctor, Sara is soon on a steady regimen of uppers. Meanwhile, her deadbeat son Harry (Jared Leto) aims for his shot at quick success along with his buddy Tyrone (Marlon Wayans) by selling heroin on the street. Harry and his girlfriend Marion (Jennifer Connelly) squirrel away dough so that they can open a boutique that will showcase her fashion designs. When drug deals go bad and the money starts to dry up, the three siphon off their wares for their own habits. At the same time, Sara descends further and further into a popper-induced psychosis. By the film's grisly climax, limbs are lopped off, flesh is pedaled, and electroshock therapy is administered. This film was screened at the 2000 Cannes and Toronto film festivals(n)

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: Adventure tale about a rather clueless DIY detective with his own built-in tool kit whose grafted-on gizmos and gadgets make him a one-man army and more than a match for the evil Dr Claw(n)

programme.title: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
programme.desc: A laid-back health inspector's comfortable routine receives an unwelcome shake up when he's assigned the task of training his new rookie partner and investigating the outbreak of a mysterious illness at one of the city's most posh restraints in this no-holds-barred comedy starring Blue Collar standup king Larry the Cable Guy. It's all greasy spoons and low-rent ethnic eateries in the world of seasoned big-city health inspector Larry (Larry the Cable Guy), and that's just the way he likes it. After begrudgingly accepting the task of training by-the-books trainee Amy (Iris Bahr), Larry lands the biggest case of his career when a group of high-class diners fall ill following a particularly pricey meal. Though the gruff but lovable health inspector soon loses his job as a direct result of his questionable manners, he soon wins the heart of a shy waitress while attempting to go undercover to crack the case and ensure that the conspirators who engineered the poisonous plan are brought to justice(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: Romantic drama in which a top female surfer training for a high-profile competition in Hawaii finds her preparation jeopardised when she falls for a hunky American football player staying in town(n)

programme.title: Blue Crush 2
programme.desc: California teen Dana is a champion surfer who never met a wave she couldn't conquer. When her father pressures her to buckle down and go to college, she flees her Beverly Hills home for the adventure of a lifetime. Dana's late mother grew up in South Africa, and kept a detailed diary about her childhood experiences. With the journal in hand and a mismatched gang of surf fanatics watching her back, Dana embarks on an odyssey along the breathtaking southern coast of Africa to fulfill her mother's dream-one long, flawless journey down the barrel of the killer waves of Jeffreys Bay(n)

programme.desc: A high-school senior learns he's descended from a long line of werewolves, and attempts to choose between embracing his inner-beast and holding on to his humanity(n)

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: In this black comedy about workplace politics of the undead, cubicle dweller Evan (Fran Kranz) starts to worry about his chance for a promotion when it looks like his office has been infiltrated by vampires(n)

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: The plans of five college friends headed for a fun-filled weekend get abruptly changed when they find a 7-year-old girl alone at an empty café and have no choice but to drive her home. Once there, the group's worst nightmares are realized(n)

programme.title: Whiskers

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: In this unconventional horror film, a high schooler discovers he's a werewolf after his parents are savagely murdered. He later ends up in a remote mountain town, where he meets others of his kind and fights for the love of a beautiful woman(n)

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: In this black comedy about workplace politics of the undead, cubicle dweller Evan (Fran Kranz) starts to worry about his chance for a promotion when it looks like his office has been infiltrated by vampires(n)

programme.title: The Descent 2
programme.desc: The Descent editor Jon Harris makes the leap to the director's chair in this sequel to Neil Marshall's claustrophobic 2005 creature flick. Sarah Carter (Shauna MacDonald) has managed to escape from the Appalachian cave system where all of her friends were killed by "crawlers" -- primordial humanoids who have adapted to living in the subterranean darkness. In hopes that some of the spelunkers may have survived, Sheriff Redmond Vaines rounds up his deputies for a rescue mission, and decides to take Sarah along as a guide. At first Sarah has no memory of the horrors that wait below, but the further the team pushes into the cave, the more vivid her flashbacks become until the reality of the situation sinks in. Now, the rescue crew is being hunted from the shadows by a whole new clan of crawlers that are even more vicious and terrifying than their predecessors. Sarah was lucky to make it out of the caves alive the first time -- will that luck carry over into her second descent, or is she doomed to die while dreaming of escaping into the sunlight?(n)

programme.title: Let Us Prey
programme.desc: Rachel is a rookie cop ready to begin her first night shift in the local police station of small Scottish, backwater town. However, this is a night she will never forget; for when Six arrives...all hell will break loose, with Rachel caught right in the centre of it(n)

programme.title: Scar Tissue
programme.desc: A young man and a female cop hunt a serial killer who supposedly died years earlier(n)

programme.title: Meskada
programme.desc: Class and economics muddy the investigation of a homicide in this thriller from director Josh Sternfeld. When a child is found murdered in the small town of Hilliard, police detective Noah Cordin (Nick Stahl) is assigned to investigate the case. The victim's mother, Allison Connor (Laura Benanti), is a wealthy and well-connected member of the County Board of Commissioners, so Cordin is under pressure to find the killer as soon as possible, but working with rookie officer Leslie Spencer (Rachel Nichols), he isn't finding many substantial clues. One of the few pieces of evidence suggests the culprit may have been from the nearby town of Caswell. Cordin was born and raised in Caswell and knows its history well -- while Hilliard is a prosperous suburban community, Caswell is a working-class town fallen on hard times, and its survival is dependent on a proposed factory coming into town. As Cordin spends more and more time in Caswell, he becomes a target for the resentment the locals feel toward their wealthier neighbors, and a tense situation becomes potentially explosive when word begins to circulate that Connor may use her influence to keep the new employer out of Caswell unless someone comes forward to identity who killed her son. Meskada (named for the county that contains both Hilliard and Caswell) also stars Norman Reedus, Kellan Lutz, Jonathan Tucker, and Grace Gummer(n)

programme.title: Margaret Cho: psyCHO
programme.desc: Comedian Margaret Cho performs a stand-up routine at the Gramercy Theatre in New York City. Her set includes tributes to Robin Williams and Joan Rivers(n)

programme.title: Steve-O: Guilty as Charged
programme.desc: Comedian Steve-O performs outrageous stunts and riotous tricks that hold nothing back(n)

programme.title: Like Sunday, Like Rain

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: A zany season of a girls' fast-pitch softball team is followed as parents go crazy for wins and the coach is torn between pulling out all the stops in search of victory or actually teaching his players about life and fair play(n)

programme.title: The Lucky Ones
programme.desc: Tim Robbins, Rachel McAdams, and Michael Peña star in director Neil Burger's bittersweet road drama concerning three soldiers who return from fighting in Iraq to discover that things aren't quite what they remember them to be. Collee (McAdams), T.K. (Peña), and Cheaver (Robbins) are three Iraq War veterans who were honorably discharged after suffering various injuries on the battlefield. Upon returning home to find that life has continued in their absence, the three former soldiers set out on an impromptu road trip designed to tie up the loose ends they left behind. For Collee it's all about getting her heroic boyfriend's guitar back to his family since he saved her life on the battlefield. Meanwhile, T.K. seeks to summon the courage to face his wife after suffering a debilitating injury on the battlefield, and Cheaver embarks on a monumental gambling spree in order to raise the money for his son's college tuition(n)

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story
programme.desc: After killing himself, a young man enters a strange purgatory and tries to find his ex-girlfriend, who has also committed suicide. Patrick Fugit and Shannyn Sossamon star in this twisted black comedy(n)

programme.title: Alec Mapa: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Stand-up comedy by Alec Mapa about raising an adopted child with his husband(n)

programme.title: HIGH School
programme.desc: A straight-laced high-school valedictorian schemes to get the entire senior class stoned in order to circumvent his principal's mandatory drug-testing policy. Henry Burke (Matt Bush) is the kind of teenager every parent dreams about having; he never ditches school, gets straight A's, and he's secured a college scholarship to pay for his higher education. Unfortunately there's just one thing standing in between Henry and his bright future -- his high-school principal. An uptight authoritarian with a hard-line anti-marijuana stance, Principal Gordon (Michael Chiklis) announces that the entire senior class will undergo mandatory drug testing, and anyone who refuses will be immediately expelled. Henry has just danced with Mary Jane for the very first time, and now his entire future is on the line thanks to a few innocent tokes. But Henry is a bright kid, and when he and local pothead Travix Breaux (Sean Marquette) put their heads together, they come up with a brilliant plan to subvert the testing policy: if they can just get every student in school stoned, Principal Gordon's plan to crucify his pot-loving charges will go completely up in smoke(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Whimsical drama based on the life of early 20th century author Beatrix Potter, creator of Peter Rabbit. As a young woman Potter rails against her parents' wishes for her to marry and settle down. Instead, she continues to write about and draw the animals she's adored since childhood. Her early attempts to find a publisher for her children's stories are unsuccessful, but an offer from a small firm will turn her into a literary phenomenon - and lead to a meeting that will change her life(n)

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: Cop-turned-con artist Steven Russell ends up in jail and meets fellow inmate Phillip Morris, who becomes the love of his life. For years, Steven plots intricate cons in order to free both of them from prison and earn enough money so they can live comfortably on the outside(n)

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates
programme.desc: Jean-Jacques Annaud's WWII thriller is set in war torn Stalingrad, where the Nazis are threatening to overrun the city. Nikita Khrushchev arrives to stiffen the defending troops resolve and decides they need a hero to rally the forces. He finds one in Vassily Zaitsev, a deadly sniper whose expertise soon has the Germans in turmoil. To take him down, and therefore end the Russian's morale-boosted defence, the Germans send in Major Konig, Zaitsev's equal as a sniper, and the war torn ruins of Stalingrad become a deadly hunting ground for the pair(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: Checkmate. Henry finally runs out of patience and weds a pregnant Anne in a secret ceremony; Cromwell is appointed chancellor after Thomas More steps down; the Pope condemns Henry's behaviour and threatens him with excommunication; Katherine is warned not to return to court; an assassin targets Anne(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: The Act of Succession. Henry commands his people to swear an oath of "allegiance and recognition of the King's supremacy" to both church and state, an oath Sir Thomas More is not wont to accept; the King's womanising ways are brought to the attention of Anne, who arranges, and gives her blessing to, his next mistress. Also, Anne has a confrontation with Henry's daughter, Lady Mary(n)

Patrick Wilson, Jordi Molla, Emilio Echevarria(n)

programme.title: Cry Freedom
programme.desc: A powerful drama that helped expose to the world the malfeasance of South African apartheid, Cry Freedom chronicles the fact-based friendship between an outspoken white newspaper editor who brazenly rejects racist British policies and South African pacifistic civil-rights activist Steve Biko. After Biko suspiciously dies, Woods, though forced to flee the country with his family, continued to broadcast Biko's message to the world(n)

programme.title: Born to Be Blue
programme.desc: In this stirring biopic, jazzman Chet Baker relearns his craft in the late '60s after his front teeth are knocked out during a mugging. As he strives to get his career back on track and overcome a drug addiction, he receives support from his girlfriend, an actress who was cast to play his lover in a movie about his life(n)

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: A young woman tries to find her biological mom in this ensemble comedy about Mother's Day. Elsewhere, a divorced mother of two falls for a guy with two kids of his own, and an overstressed mom is visited by her bickering parents(n)

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: Genetically created polar bears run amok and terrorize everyone in sight after they are created by a company seeking to take advantage of global warming(n)

programme.title: One & Done/Ben Simmons
programme.desc: The sprawling journey of Ben Simmons, the top 2016 NBA draft pick, is chronicled, from his relatively anonymous Australian upbringing to high school and college in the U.S. to the top of the rookie class in the world's foremost basketball league(n)

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: Three high-tech tribes engage in a deadly war for supremacy and survival on a distant planet(n)

programme.title: Brand: A Second Coming
programme.desc: Profiling comedian Russell Brand on his journey from addict to an activist whose goal is to encourage a worldwide economic revolution(n)

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A documentary examining a controversial practice in Thailand's criminal justice system whereby inmates can earn their freedom by winning a series of Muay Thai fights. The focus is on Noy Khaopan, a convicted murderer who fights for his release(n)

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: Andrew Niccol's 21st century war drama Good Kill stars Ethan Hawke as Air Force Major Thomas Egan, a talented pilot who spends his days operating a drone over various terrorist threats in the middle east while sitting in a trailer on a base in Las Vegas. Egan hates not being allowed to fly actual planes anymore, and as the CIA begins dictating orders to Egan and his crew, he begins to feel morally disconnected from his job. This leads to more conflict at home with his wife (January Jones), who wishes her husband could focus on their family as much as his military duty. Good Kill screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist III
programme.desc: A 12-year-old girl is troubled by ghostly sightings when she moves into a downtown Chicago high-rise with her aunt and uncle. But her private-school psychologist thinks she is delusional(n)

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: A romantic comedy. With zombies. Shaun's humdrum existence takes a turn for the interesting when the undead take over London. Leaping into action, Shaun gathers his loved ones in the safest place he knows - the pub. Gags and gore galore(n)

programme.title: Premonition
programme.desc: Sandra Bullock stars in this supernatural mystery thriller about a housewife who finds herself jumping back and forth in time as she tries to save her husband from a fatal car crash(n)

programme.title: Brad Williams: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Comedian Brad Williams delivers a stand-up set that tackles race and political correctness, as well as how his father raised him to deal with adversity(n)

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: Roger Donaldson's bank heist conspiracy-thriller - scripted by Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais - stars Jason Statham as the leader of a gang of thieves who bite off more than they can chew. When car dealer and one-time crook Terry Leather is approached by his old flame Martine Love with a proposition that would put his money worries behind him for good, he jumps at the chance. Leather quickly assembles a team which digs a tunnel directly into a London bank's vault. But what he hasn't been told is that, in addition to the money, he'll also be stealing a safety box containing material that, if it saw the light of day, would be extremely damaging to the royal family. Another box they take holds further dramatic revelations concerning establishment figures. So it's not long before Leather and the gang are pursued by the police, MI5 and various thugs, all keen to get their hands on the incendiary information..(n)

programme.title: Strikeforce: Lawler vs. Shields
programme.desc: Mixed-martial-arts action from 2009 in St. Louis. Included: Robbie Lawler vs. Jake Shields in a 182-pound bout; Andrei Arlovski vs. Brett Rogers; and Nick Diaz vs. Scott Smith(n)

programme.title: Lost Highway
programme.desc: Fred Madison, a saxophonist, is accused under mysterious circumstances of murdering his wife Renee. On death row, he inexplicably morphs into a young man named Pete Dayton, leading a completely different life. When Pete is released, his and Fred's paths begin to cross in a surreal, suspenseful web of intrigue, orchestrated by a shady gangster boss named Dick Laurent(n)

programme.title: The Nasty Show Hosted by Artie Lange
programme.desc: Artie Lange hosts a lineup of deranged comics in performances that are not for the faint of heart. Featured: Mike Wilmot; Mike Ward; Gina Yashere; Luenell; Jimmy Carr; and Gilbert Gottfried(n)

programme.title: Zero Days
programme.desc: A look at cyberwarfare explores how a computer virus called Stuxnet, which was allegedly created by the United States and Israel to shut down an Iranian nuclear facility, has ushered in a new era of international conflict(n)

programme.title: A Murder in the Park
programme.desc: A stunning look at the pardon of former death-row inmate Anthony Porter, and subsequent arrest of another man, for a double murder committed in Chicago in the '80s. The filmmakers question whether Porter was in fact guilty of the crime(n)

programme.title: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
programme.desc: A laid-back health inspector's comfortable routine receives an unwelcome shake up when he's assigned the task of training his new rookie partner and investigating the outbreak of a mysterious illness at one of the city's most posh restraints in this no-holds-barred comedy starring Blue Collar standup king Larry the Cable Guy. It's all greasy spoons and low-rent ethnic eateries in the world of seasoned big-city health inspector Larry (Larry the Cable Guy), and that's just the way he likes it. After begrudgingly accepting the task of training by-the-books trainee Amy (Iris Bahr), Larry lands the biggest case of his career when a group of high-class diners fall ill following a particularly pricey meal. Though the gruff but lovable health inspector soon loses his job as a direct result of his questionable manners, he soon wins the heart of a shy waitress while attempting to go undercover to crack the case and ensure that the conspirators who engineered the poisonous plan are brought to justice(n)

programme.title: American Heart
programme.desc: Jack Kelson (Jeff Bridges) is an ex-con trying to go straight, earn some honest money and move with his son Nicky (Edward Furlong) to Alaska and a new life. Unfortunately, he has to cope with Charlotte (Lucinda Jenny), a prison pen-pal who now wants to get a little more personal and old partner Rainey (Don Harvey), who holds out the temptation of easy money for one last job. Martin Bell's film is about a father/son relationship made harder by tough times and decisions on the fringes of Seattle's blue-collar society(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: A divorced boat builder discovers that his preteen son's stepdad is masking an evil side, forcing him to desperately try to protect his ex-wife and son from the new man in their lives in this intense psychological thriller(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: The film is a mesmerizing and violent crime opus set in 1980 West Texas, where a man finds a fortune in drug loot, and tries to dodge a sheriff and a bounty hunter out to recover it(n)

programme.title: The Yards
programme.desc: James Gray's taut thriller stars Mark Wahlberg as an ex-con, received back into the bosom of his family, led by his uncle James Caan. Caan runs a company that has lucrative contracts to repair New York's subway trains but he also has to make sure the opposition are seen in a bad light and that means employing Joaquin Phoenix, Wahlberg's best friend, to undertake a little sabotage. As Wahlberg gets sucked into the criminal underworld surrounding the repair yards and violence explodes, so he finds himself a target for the police - and his uncle, who needs to guarantee his silence(n)

Period adventure, with Sean Connery, Candice Bergen, Brian Keith and John Huston.(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt.(n)

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A widowed father is coping badly with his wife's death, but his son is convinced that what he really needs is some new romance in his life. He arranges for his dad to go on a radio phone-in show, and his touching story moves a reporter to respond, even though she is already engaged. She returns to her fiance, but the boy, certain she is the woman for his father, plots to bring them together. Romantic comedy, with Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan.(n)

programme.title: Maid in Manhattan
programme.desc: A chambermaid at an exclusive hotel daringly tries on a designer dress belonging to a guest - and is spotted by a wealthy politician, who mistakes her for a socialite and invites her on a date. However, the differences in their social backgrounds soon become apparent and threaten their budding romance. Comedy, starring Jennifer Lopez, Ralph Fiennes, Natasha Richardson and Bob Hoskins.(n)

programme.title: As Good as It Gets
programme.desc: A bigoted misanthropic writer, who treats everyone he meets with contempt, is forced to look after a gay neighbour's dog, and develops an empathy with another creature for the first time in years. Sensing a need for human company, he pursues an unlikely romance with a waitress, who is the only person willing to put up with his rudeness. Romantic comedy drama, with Jack Nicholson, Helen Hunt, Cuba Gooding Jr and Greg Kinnear.(n)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: An American expatriate who has joined the foreign legion and an amateur archaeologist find a previously unknown burial site in Egypt. The team starts to dig, hoping to find lost riches, but instead they disturb the tomb of an ancient Egyptian priest who rises from the dead to ensnare the world and wreak vengeance on humanity. Starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz and John Hannah(n)

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Adventurer Rick O'Connell once again battles the resurrected mummy in this sequel to the 1999 hit(n)

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Superb special effects propel this mind-bending sci-fi trip about a young man (Hayden Christensen) with the power to teleport himself anywhere on the planet. Life is a blast for him, until the arrival of a mysterious tracker (Samuel L. Jackson) from a secret society that is out to capture his kind and others like him. Directed by Doug Liman and written by David S. Goyer, Jim Uhls and Simon Kinberg, who adapted the script from Steven Gould's young-adult best sellers "Jumper" and "Exile."(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: Street-racing sequel following an adrenaline-junkie automobile addict who narrowly avoids jail by agreeing to move in with his father in Tokyo. However, he soon discovers the thrill of the local underground drift racing scene and unwittingly becomes involved with the Yakuza(n)

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Director Justin Lin again takes the helm for the fifth helping in the high-octane Fast & Furious action-thriller franchise starring Vin Diesel and the late Paul Walker. This time around, car-thieving bad boy Dominic Toretto escapes the clutches of the law in order to attempt a career-crowning heist. He hooks up with his cop-turned-robber pal Brian O'Conner to relieve Brazil's most corrupt businessman of his vast, ill-gotten fortune - after which the buddies plan to live a very quiet, extremely comfortable life. However, it's going to be a tricky job to pull off, so they enlist a bunch of associates from their previous (mis)adventures and head south. But to succeed they'll have to evade the FBI's Luke Hobbs, who is determined to bring their crime spree to an end, and is closing in on them fast. Well, that's the plot, but of course, as with its predecessors, the film is really all about the stunts, the testosterone-fuelled car action and silly macho strutting..(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: It's 2035 and techno-phobic cop Will Smith investigates a crime possibly committed by a robot. Is it part of a wider threat to humanity?(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimsby
programme.desc: A working-class British soccer hooligan discovers that his long-lost brother is now a well-mannered superspy. When their reunion at a charity event causes the latter to botch a crucial mission, the two men must team up to defeat a terrorist organization(n)

programme.title: Blow
programme.desc: Following the life of cocaine-trafficking pioneer George Jung in a way that recalls Martin Scorsese's Casino, Blow recounts the man's days from his 1950s childhood in Boston to his downfall in the 1980s. George (played by Johnny Depp) begins his life as the son of Fred (Ray Liotta), an earnest breadwinner, and Ermine (Rachel Griffiths), who frequently walks out on them in pursuit of a more fulfilling life. When George moves west to California in the late '60s, accompanied by best pal Tuna (Ethan Suplee), he becomes an entrepreneur in the marijuana business, which soon spreads to the East Coast as well, with girlfriend Barbara (Franka Potente) smuggling the product during her stewardess shifts. George is arrested in 1972 -- at which time Barbara dies of cancer -- but George finds a new ally in Diego (Jordi Molla), who proposes the idea that he become the American conduit for Colombian kingpin Pablo Escobar (Cliff Curtis). George flourishes in the heyday of the disco era, and falls for Mirtha (Penelope Cruz), a self-serving bombshell who eventually has a daughter with him. Trouble escalates as the FBI threatens to bring George and his crew down, while he desperately tries to be a stable parent to his young offspring. Blow also features Paul Reubens and Max Perlich in featured roles(n)

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: Sequel in which a great white shark returns to terrorize a teen sailing regatta as the town of Amity tries to recover from the previous attacks(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: It's 2035 and techno-phobic cop Will Smith investigates a crime possibly committed by a robot. Is it part of a wider threat to humanity?(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: Luc Besson's high-end, high-octane mystery adventure set mostly in the 23rd Century. When a beautiful young woman falls into his life from another dimension, a New York cabbie discovers that Earth is facing an impending attack of pure evil. In a complex plot involving ancient curses, a corrupt corporate boss, all-powerful monsters, shape-changing assassins, laser battles and huge explosions, the unlikely pair set out to locate the five mystical elements that make up the only defence against worldwide destruction(n)

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: A Mexican immigrant working as a maid for an affluent Los Angeles couple has to maintain control of her own daughter, who wants to assimilate(n)

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: A group of wanna-be filmmakers and actors concocts a scheme to make a movie with a major star without having to pay him in this comedy. Bobby Bowfinger (Steve Martin) has struggled for years to make it in Hollywood with no real success; he's convinced that he has to make his big break soon or it will be too late. Bobby has a script, and he has a cast, including an ingenue straight off the bus from Ohio (Heather Graham), a one-time regional stage star who fondly recalls her brief moment of glory (Christine Baranski), and a hunky aspiring matinee idol (Kohl Sudduth). He also has a young associate named Dave (Jamie Kennedy), who has a low-level job at a movie studio as a gofer -- which means that he has keys to every part of the lot and can "borrow" whatever they need. All they need is a star, but without any money, how do they get one? Kit Ramsey (Eddie Murphy) is a leading action star, and he is obviously beyond Bowfinger's budget. But Bobby has an idea: what if he tricked Kit into appearing in the film without his knowing it? Steve Martin also wrote the film's screenplay, and former Muppets performer Frank Oz directs(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Anarchic, nihilistic satire on modern life in which an office worker who feels emotionally deadened by his consumerist lifestyle has a chance encounter with a charismatic man. Finding that they are kindred spirits, the two men start up a no-holds-barred bare-knuckle fighting club, with the aim of making its members feel 'alive' once again(n)

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: Would you pay money to journey into the mind of the star of Con Air, The Killing Fields, and In The Line of Fire? Puppeteer Craig Schwartz (John Cusack) is having money problems, so he takes a temporary job as a file clerk on the seventh-and-a-half floor of a large office building. One day, while rummaging behind a cabinet, he finds a small door that leads to the center of the mind of actor John Malkovich (played by, you guessed it, John Malkovich). Craig discovers that entering the portal allows him to become John Malkovich for a brief spell, and in time he and his beautiful but aloof co-worker Maxine (Catherine Keener) get the bright idea to charge admission for the privilege of spending 15 minutes inside the head of a well-known actor. Malkovich realizes that something strange is happening to him, but can do little to stop it, as strangers take over his mind for a quarter-hour at a time. Craig's wife, Lotte (Cameron Diaz), eventually takes a trip into Malkovich's psyche, and she soon finds herself in love with Maxine, with whom Malkovich has an affair; meanwhile, Maxine in time becomes infatuated with both Craig and Lotte, but only when they're inside Malkovich. Being John Malkovich marked the feature-length debut of director Spike Jonze, who previously made acclaimed music videos for Weezer, the Beastie Boys, and the Breeders, among others(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Apocalyptic thriller in which life on Earth is threatened by a rogue comet. When a reporter in pursuit of a Washington sex scandal is arrested by the FBI, she discovers that the story is an inconsequential part of a huge cover-up. She soon finds herself in possession of the biggest story in the history of humankind: that a comet will destroy the planet in one year's time, unless a risky joint US-Russian outer-space mission can deflect it(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: The Wedding. Claire enters into a forced marriage with Jamie, but soon begins to experience deeper feelings for him(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: Luc Besson's high-end, high-octane mystery adventure set mostly in the 23rd Century. When a beautiful young woman falls into his life from another dimension, a New York cabbie discovers that Earth is facing an impending attack of pure evil. In a complex plot involving ancient curses, a corrupt corporate boss, all-powerful monsters, shape-changing assassins, laser battles and huge explosions, the unlikely pair set out to locate the five mystical elements that make up the only defence against worldwide destruction(n)

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: Roland Emmerich's blockbuster stars Dennis Quaid as climatologist Jack Hall; a lone voice predicting that global warming will lead to a new ice age. He is ridiculed for his views, but his fears swiftly come true when a dramatic temperature rise in the Antarctic causes the world's weather to go mad, with tornadoes devastating Los Angeles, Britain literally flash-frozen and New York first inundated by floods and then overwhelmed by a killer cold snap. A few survivors, including Jack's son Sam, take refuge in a library and Jack sets out on a desperate mission to save them. The action-packed film (which won a BAFTA for its stunning special effects) may have compressed and dramatised the effects of global warming but, disturbingly, the basic science Emmerich uses in the film to advance the plot isn't that far removed from the increasing dangers the world faces today(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
programme.desc: In this thrilling continuation of the epic space opera, an ex-stormtrooper, a scrappy desert dweller and a droid companion embark on a journey that brings them face-to-face with heroes from the past, who are now battling a fascist regime called the First Order(n)

programme.desc: Would you pay money to journey into the mind of the star of Con Air, The Killing Fields, and In The Line of Fire? Puppeteer Craig Schwartz (John Cusack) is having money problems, so he takes a temporary job as a file clerk on the seventh-and-a-half floor of a large office building. One day, while rummaging behind a cabinet, he finds a small door that leads to the center of the mind of actor John Malkovich (played by, you guessed it, John Malkovich). Craig discovers that entering the portal allows him to become John Malkovich for a brief spell, and in time he and his beautiful but aloof co-worker Maxine (Catherine Keener) get the bright idea to charge admission for the privilege of spending 15 minutes inside the head of a well-known actor. Malkovich realizes that something strange is happening to him, but can do little to stop it, as strangers take over his mind for a quarter-hour at a time. Craig's wife, Lotte (Cameron Diaz), eventually takes a trip into Malkovich's psyche, and she soon finds herself in love with Maxine, with whom Malkovich has an affair; meanwhile, Maxine in time becomes infatuated with both Craig and Lotte, but only when they're inside Malkovich. Being John Malkovich marked the feature-length debut of director Spike Jonze, who previously made acclaimed music videos for Weezer, the Beastie Boys, and the Breeders, among others(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Apocalyptic thriller in which life on Earth is threatened by a rogue comet. When a reporter in pursuit of a Washington sex scandal is arrested by the FBI, she discovers that the story is an inconsequential part of a huge cover-up. She soon finds herself in possession of the biggest story in the history of humankind: that a comet will destroy the planet in one year's time, unless a risky joint US-Russian outer-space mission can deflect it(n)

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: The Wedding. Claire enters into a forced marriage with Jamie, but soon begins to experience deeper feelings for him(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: Luc Besson's high-end, high-octane mystery adventure set mostly in the 23rd Century. When a beautiful young woman falls into his life from another dimension, a New York cabbie discovers that Earth is facing an impending attack of pure evil. In a complex plot involving ancient curses, a corrupt corporate boss, all-powerful monsters, shape-changing assassins, laser battles and huge explosions, the unlikely pair set out to locate the five mystical elements that make up the only defence against worldwide destruction(n)

programme.title: Not Easily Broken
programme.desc: Director Bill Duke steps behind the camera for this adaptation of the T.D. Jakes novel concerning a newly married couple that finds their union threatened by pressures involving faith, family, and finances. As the couple exchanges their vows, the minister lays a cord around them while uttering the blessing, "a threefold cord is not easily broken." Later, during their darkest hour, the minister's advice to always keep God at the center of their marriage could be the only thing that keeps this troubled pair together(n)

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: In this hilarious romantic comedy, a military-defense contractor is rehired by his former boss to oversee the launch of a satellite in Hawaii. He reconnects with an old flame while there, but finds himself increasingly drawn to an Air Force pilot assigned to watch over him(n)

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: A young surfer is hunted by a great white shark at a secluded beach, and ends up stranded on an embankment away from the shoreline. Alone and wounded, she attempts to survive the attack and get ashore in this bone-chilling thriller(n)

programme.title: Kill Your Darlings
programme.desc: Frustrated writer Allen Ginsberg looks to a new group of contemporaries to sound his progressive ideas against, but one of his new group takes the creative attitude too far(n)

programme.title: Equity
programme.desc: A senior investment banker (Anna Gunn) tries to prove her worth to her firm by bringing in a tech company that's on the verge of going public. However, the IPO causes her to get tangled up in an investigation into securities fraud. James Purefoy, Alysia Reiner, Craig Bierko, and Sarah Megan Thomas co-star. Directed by Meera Menon, Equity made its world premiere at the 2016 Sundance Film Festival(n)

Elizabeth finally has revenge on those who killed her father, but it does not bring her comfort(n)

programme.title: The White Queen
programme.desc: Long Live the King. King Edward deals with key players scheming and maneuvering to mount the thrown(n)

programme.desc: Available. The humiliating episode at the firm leaves Christine to embrace her secondary profession as a GFE supplier(n)

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: Fabrication. Christine counterattacks in an attempt to force a settlement with the firm, while considering anonymous ways to serve her GFE clients(n)

programme.title: Boiler Room
programme.desc: This charged drama looks at the world of brokerage houses that sell bogus stocks to unsuspecting customers. Giovanni Ribisi is outstanding as a recruit who learns to trade on customers' trust in order to sell them shares in worthless companies. Costar Ben Affleck is first-rate as a driven broker who "could sell bubble gum at the lockjaw ward at Bellevue." Nia Long, Vin Diesel, Nicky Katt(n)

programme.title: Dr. T and the Women
programme.desc: Richard Gere plays Dr Sullivan Travis, top gynaecologist, happily married to Kate and looking forward to the wedding of his daughter Dee. But when his wife loses her grip on reality, Gere copes by finding solace with Bree, the golfing pro at his club. As she shows him how to improve his 'technique', he must decide between family and love in Robert Altman's comedy/ drama(n)

programme.desc: Family sports comedy about a successful football player who has to sacrifice his career to look after the seven-year-old daughter he never knew he had. The fun-loving bachelor, whose gridiron career is about to take off, is shocked to learn he has a young daughter from a forgotten fling. Against the wishes of his ambitious agent, he immerses himself in fatherhood - exchanging training sessions for junior ballet classes, and touchdowns for dolls. Starring Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson, Madison Pettis, Kyra Sedgwick, Roselyn Sanchez, Morris Chestnut, Hayes MacArthur(n)

programme.desc: 1993. Surely one of Bill Murray's finest hours - again and again! A TV weatherman finds himself endlessly reliving the same day when he travels to the small town of Punxsutawney. Dir: Harold Ramis(n)

programme.desc: Live-action adaptation of the '60s cartoon series about a modern Stone Age family(n)

programme.desc: A private-school student struggles to earn enough money to support his unstable mother. He soon meets a beautiful runaway, and together they hatch a plan to profit from her stunning good looks(n)

programme.desc: Anarchic comedy about a Rhode Island state trooper with a split personality who falls in love with the woman he is supposed to be escorting to New York for questioning. The future of the princes in the Tower is in Richard's hands: they are a threat to his reign but also to Margaret's hopes of seeing her son Henry Tudor on the throne. As Margaret plots the boys' removal, Anne is tormented by fears she has unwittingly sealed the princes' fate. Elizabeth, in sanctuary, is horrified to realise she has made a pact with her enemies and turns to witchcraft to punish the guilty(n)

programme.title: The Girlfriend Experience

programme.desc: This deeply personal biopic of country-music legend Hank Williams chronicles his tumultuous life—from his marriage to aspiring singer Audrey Mae Sheppard to his residency at the Grand Ole Opry—as he struggles with alcoholism and addiction(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Hard-hitting docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after the validity of key documents was questioned(n)

programme.title: The Sound and the Fury
programme.desc: James Franco directs this adaptation of William Faulkner's The Sound and the Fury, the writer's tale of the Compson family, a once wealthy Southern clan devolving into obscurity. Tim Blake Nelson portrays the patriarch, a boozy lawyer who oversees the lives of his children with cynical monologues delivered through an alcoholic haze. Quentin, the oldest child, goes to Harvard, but he's very close with Caddy, the only daughter in the family who has a child out of wedlock. Second son Jason attempts to rule the family with an iron fist, but he's full of resentment towards Caddy's bastard child. All of them attempt to care for the developmentally disabled Benjy (Franco). Franco employs a fractured approach to the narrative in an attempt to capture Faulkner's distinctive prose style. The Sound and the Fury screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Lady in the Van
programme.desc: Truth is stranger than fiction in this comedy-drama based on the real-life tale of a homeless woman named Miss Shepherd (Maggie Smith), who parks her van in the driveway of a house owned by playwright Alan Bennett (Alex Jennings) and lives there for 15 years. Over the course of her stay, the two form a unique friendship. Jim Broadbent, Dominic Cooper, Samuel Barnett, and Frances de la Tour co-star. This adaptation of the 1999 stage hit was directed by Nicholas Hytner (The History Boys)(n)

programme.title: Our Little Sister
programme.desc: At their estranged father's funeral, three twentysomething siblings learn that they have a teenage half sister, and invite her to live with them in the seaside town of Kamakura. In time, her presence forces them to reflect on their own lives and family ties(n)

programme.title: The Interpreter
programme.desc: Thriller. When a United Nations interpreter overhears a plot to assassinate the leader of an African state, a Secret Service agent is assigned to investigate. As the agent delves deeper into the allegation, he discovers that the interpreter has a murky past and begins to doubt her story(n)

programme.title: Bad Lieutenant
programme.desc: (1992); Director Abel Ferrara's controversial crime drama. 'The Lieutenant' (Harvey Keitel) is addicted to drugs, alcohol and gambling, and is up to his neck in debt. He's also one of New York's finest, and when a nun is brutally raped, his desire to find the rapist is only increased by the $50,000 reward on offer. M,W,R,S(n)

programme.title: I Saw the Light
programme.desc: This deeply personal biopic of country-music legend Hank Williams chronicles his tumultuous life—from his marriage to aspiring singer Audrey Mae Sheppard to his residency at the Grand Ole Opry—as he struggles with alcoholism and addiction(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Kill the Irishman
programme.desc: This biopic follows Cleveland union rep Danny Greene, who earned notoriety in the mid-'70s for his willingness to defy the Italian mob. A former Mafia enforcer, Greene managed to survive numerous assassination attempts, and eventually he dealt a devastating blow to organized-crime syndicates across the U.S(n)

programme.title: Big Star: Nothing Can Hurt Me
programme.desc: A detailed, poignant profile of the seminal power-pop band Big Star, who released three albums that influenced many groups in the decades after they came out to mostly indifferent sales(n)

programme.title: The Children of Huang Shi
programme.desc: News 'stringer' George Hogg arrives in 1937 China looking for the story of a lifetime, and finds himself caught up in the struggle of terrified Chinese children(n)

programme.title: Secret Window
programme.desc: From writer/director David Koepp (Stir of Echoes) comes this filmed adaptation of Stephen King's novella Secret Window, Secret Garden, one of four stories in the collection Four Past Midnight. Johnny Depp stars as Mort Rainey, a recently divorced author who decides to take some time off at his cottage. Unfortunately for Rainey, John Shooter (John Turturro), an unbalanced wannabe writer, tracks him down, claiming that Rainey plagiarized his work. Also starring Maria Bello, Charles S. Dutton, and Timothy Hutton, Secret Window is the second story from Four Past Midnight to be adapted as a film, the first being 1995's made-for-television The Langoliers(n)

programme.title: The Red Violin
programme.desc: A violin expert traces the history of a priceless instrument, revealing a variety of stories linked to its owners over three centuries(n)

programme.title: Barton Fink
programme.desc: Award-winning surreal comedy from the Coen brothers. A one-hit playwright is employed to write a screenplay in 40s Hollywood - and is instantly paralysed by writer's block(n)

programme.title: Kill the Irishman
programme.desc: This biopic follows Cleveland union rep Danny Greene, who earned notoriety in the mid-'70s for his willingness to defy the Italian mob. A former Mafia enforcer, Greene managed to survive numerous assassination attempts, and eventually he dealt a devastating blow to organized-crime syndicates across the U.S(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: At the absolute height of World War II, German generals hatch a daring plan to assassinate Adolf Hitler and effectively render the German war machine impotent. Directed by Bryan Singer, Valkyrie stars Tom Cruise as Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg, the real-life mastermind behind the elaborate plot known as Project Valkyrie: a plan to assassinate Hitler and overthrow his government from the inside. Stauffenberg has been a loyal soldier and an asset to the Reich for his entire military career, but after losing an eye, a hand, and three fingers in an Allied bombing, he reaches a breaking point. The destructive madness that his country is unleashing on the world has become too terrible for the colonel to stand silent. He joins the resistance movement -- a treasonous act, punishable by death -- and risks his life and the life of his family for the chance to change history. Comprised of high-ranking officials working in secret, the German Resistance has access to the inner workings of the government and military, putting them in the perfect position to dispatch the dictator and then use his own official contingency plan to seize power -- before the army, the S.S., and loyal party members can put someone just as diabolical in the Führer's place(n)

programme.title: The Children of Huang Shi
programme.desc: News 'stringer' George Hogg arrives in 1937 China looking for the story of a lifetime, and finds himself caught up in the struggle of terrified Chinese children(n)

programme.title: The Red Violin

When she gets dumped by her suave boyfriend, Jane (Judd) tries to recover by researching male mating patterns and sharing an apartment with her platonic pal, playboy Eddie Alden (Hugh Jackman). Marisa Tomei, Ellen Barkin, Laura Regan, Catherine Dent(n)

programme.title: Trainspotting
programme.desc: A Scottish heroin addict tries to kick the habit, but struggles because of out-of-control mates(n)

programme.desc: Feel-good comedy of errors about three loveably inept criminals. In a spoof of buddy movies, a group of tone-deaf musicians are forced by the Mafia to attempt to crack three safes in a week - or else(n)

What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing(n)

Macy), who wants to snuff out cigarettes. Maria Bello, Adam Brody, Sam Elliott, Katie Holmes, Rob Lowe. Directed by Jason Reitman(n)

programme.title: Dysfunctional Friends
programme.desc: Years after graduating college and going their separate ways, nine former friends reunite at the funeral of a quirky, wealthy acquaintance, and learn that they are all eligible for a big inheritance if they can just spend five days together at his former estate. Meanwhile, as the clock starts ticking, what first seemed like a lighthearted reunion quickly turns sour as old wounds are reopened, and lingering grudges are resurrected. Now if anyone leaves, everyone sacrifices their portion of the estate. And as the hours stretch into days, the prospect of being trapped in a mansion with people who know their deepest, darkest secrets grows increasingly unbearable for all involved. Christian Keyes, Stacy Kiebler, Stacey Dash, and Terrell Owens star(n)

programme.desc: Whimsical romantic comedy about two college students, Al and Imogen, who fall in love. However, a youthful fear of commitment threatens to destabilise their romance, and when Imogen gets an opportunity to study elsewhere, Al breaks up the relationship - only to realise that he has made a huge mistake(n)

programme.title: Bull Durham
programme.desc: Comedy drama about a romantic triangle set against the backdrop of minor league baseball. Susan Sarandon is a baseball fan, almost religiously devoted to the sport. Every season, she choses a newcomer to her local team, the Durham Bulls, to sleep with, read poetry to and coach in her own inimitable style. However, this year things are different and she finds herself forced to choose between an undisciplined rookie (Tim Robbins) and a hardened and mature veteran of the game (Kevin Costner)(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: Ice Cube co-wrote and stars in this second sequel to the 1995 comedy "Friday," which once again follows a day in the life of two cousins in Los Angeles. This time, Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) are robbed by Santa Claus on Christmas Eve, and the not-so-jolly old elf has made off with their rent money. John Witherspoon, Bebe Drake(n)

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam - Live From Atlanta
programme.desc: Faizon Love hosts an evening of stand-up comedy routines. Performers include: Red Grant; Finesse Mitchell; Gina Yashere; Robert Powell; and Lavar Walker(n)

programme.title: Sneakers
programme.desc: Robert Redford heads a team of security experts who stumble upon a conspiracy to obtain a box with the capability to decode all existing encryption codes(n)

programme.title: One Week
programme.desc: In this independent drama, Varson (Kenny Young) is a week away from marrying his long-time girlfriend Kiya (Saadiqa Muhammed), and things ought to be going well for him. But that's hardly the case; Varson is having serious trouble negotiating the corporate battlefield at work, and his friend Tyco (Eric Lane) has taken up residence on his couch (and isn't taking the hint that it's time to leave). But these problems seem like small potatoes when Varson is informed that his name appears on a list of men who slept with a woman who has tested positive for HIV, leaving him to wonder if he's contracted the AIDS virus. One Week was the first feature film from writer and director Carl Seaton; leading man Kenny Young also contributed to the screenplay(n)

programme.title: Android Cop
programme.desc: A cop and his android partner enter the quarantined zone of a futuristic city to uncover the source of a devastating plague. Meanwhile, it's a race against time to stop the germ from spreading. Michael Jai White, Kadeem Hardison, and Charles S. Dutton star(n)

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: Drama starring Katie Holmes and William Fichtner following a group of young Californians intent on having a wild time on Christmas Eve. A checkout girl at a supermarket changes shifts with a friend and ends up on a wild, drug-fuelled night with two actors. Meanwhile, her colleague has his own hair-raising adventures in Las Vegas, and the different threads of the plot begin to weave together(n)

programme.title: The Bleeding
programme.desc: In this action-packed horror shocker, former Army ranger Shawn Black (Michael Matthias) hunts the vampires that killed his family and embraces his true potential as a slayer with the help of a mysterious priest named Reverend Ray(n)

programme.title: Smoke
programme.desc: This ensemble drama centers on a neighborhood cigar store as it chronicles the entangled lives of fifteen characters. The story is divided into five chapters each bearing the name of a different character. The main players have roles in all five stories. The first, "Paul" follows recently widowed novelist Paul Benjamin whose wife died during a bank robbery. He is almost hit by a truck when a black teenager who calls himself Rashid, saves him. The thankful novelist lets the teen stay with him for a while. Rashid's story forms the basis of chapter two. Paul is visited by Rashid's aunt who tells him that the boys true name is Thomas Cole. He has recently learned that his dad is really alive and living out of the city. Rashid journeys to meet his dad, Cyrus Cole. When he meets him, Rashid tells him his name is Paul Benjamin. Auggie, the cigar store manager, also gets a surprise when his ex-wife shows up to tell him his daughter is a pregnant drug addict. Rashid tells Paul that he has $6000, the spoils of a recent bank robbery perpetrated by his pal, Creeper. The rest of the chapters are equally convoluted(n)

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: A team of commandos, on a mission in a Central American jungle, find themselves hunted by an extra-terrestrial warrior(n)

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: A group of wanna-be filmmakers and actors concocts a scheme to make a movie with a major star without having to pay him in this comedy. Bobby Bowfinger (Steve Martin) has struggled for years to make it in Hollywood with no real success; he's convinced that he has to make his big break soon or it will be too late. Bobby has a script, and he has a cast, including an ingenue straight off the bus from Ohio (Heather Graham), a one-time regional stage star who fondly recalls her brief moment of glory (Christine Baranski), and a hunky aspiring matinee idol (Kohl Sudduth). He also has a young associate named Dave (Jamie Kennedy), who has a low-level job at a movie studio as a gofer -- which means that he has keys to every part of the lot and can "borrow" whatever they need. All they need is a star, but without any money, how do they get one? Kit Ramsey (Eddie Murphy) is a leading action star, and he is obviously beyond Bowfinger's budget. But Bobby has an idea: what if he tricked Kit into appearing in the film without his knowing it? Steve Martin also wrote the film's screenplay, and former Muppets performer Frank Oz directs(n)

programme.title: Grindhouse
programme.desc: Kill Bill director Quentin Tarantino and Sin City director Robert Rodriguez join forces to offer a cinematic tribute to the blood-soaked exploitation epics of yesteryear with this hyper-violent coupling of two full-length features punctuated by a collection of outrageous trailers. The first segment, directed by Rodriguez and entitled Planet Terror, details the violent struggle between a ravenous army of zombie-like humanoids who have taken control of the planet and the remaining survivors who refuse to go down without a fight. Freddy Rodriguez, Naveen Andrews, and Rose McGowan headline a cast that also includes Marley Shelton, Michael Biehn, Josh Brolin, Bruce Willis, and Tom Savini. In Death Proof -- director Tarantino's take on such peddle-to-the-metal shockers as White Line Fever -- Kurt Russell stars as an engine-revving psychopath who prefers to take out his beautiful victims at 200 mph. With a list of potential roadkill candidates that includes Rose McGowan, Jordan Ladd, Rosario Dawson, and Vanessa Ferlito, Death Proof takes viewers on an adrenaline-infused drive that's as sexy as it is shocking. Its tantalizing title borrowed from the term frequently used to describe the seedy, 1970s-era inner-city movie theaters that screened excessive, low-budget independent films containing copious amounts of violence and nudity as a means of offering counter-programming to the decidedly more restrained big-budget studio films, Grindhouse takes its love for these unabashedly sleazy efforts one step further by offering a jaw-dropping collection of fake exploitation trailers from such directors as Rob Zombie, Eli Roth, and Edgar Wright(n)

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: Drama starring Katie Holmes and William Fichtner following a group of young Californians intent on having a wild time on Christmas Eve. A checkout girl at a supermarket changes shifts with a friend and ends up on a wild, drug-fuelled night with two actors. Meanwhile, her colleague has his own hair-raising adventures in Las Vegas, and the different threads of the plot begin to weave together(n)

programme.title: Under Suspicion
programme.desc: When a powerful man is accused of murder, who tells the truth -- the man, or his estranged wife? Henry Hearst (Gene Hackman), an American attorney living in Puerto Rico, is called in to speak with police detective Victor Benezet (Morgan Freeman). A few days earlier, Hearst reported finding the body of a 12-year-old girl while taking his dog for a walk; however, investigators now believe that Hearst may have had a greater involvement in the crime than he's admitting. Under intense questioning by a confident young cop named Owens (Thomas Jane) and gentler but firm interrogation from Benezet, several cracks begin to appear in Hearst's story, but he's able to persuade the police to allow him to leave long enough to take part in a fund-raising function he'd promised to attend. However, upon his return, Hearst discovers that Benezet and Owens have been questioning someone else -- his wife Chantal (Monica Bellucci), who has been on poor terms with her husband for some time. Under Suspicion was based on the novel Brainwash by John Wainwright, which was previously filmed by French director Claude Miller as Garde a vue(n)

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: A team of commandos, on a mission in a Central American jungle, find themselves hunted by an extra-terrestrial warrior(n)
